overview: The historical performance of Warlord in 2013 at Thessaloniki and Athens, was released on 2 cd / dvd. This release of "Live in Athens 2013" is available only in 1,500 numbered copies. The 14 tracks from the tracklist are from the Athens concert in April 2013, while the 70,000 Sorrows is from a 2014 performance with singer Nikolas Leptos.
title: Warlord : Live in Athens 2013
